channel.title: Where can i change max lvls of stats?
channel.description: where can i change max lvls of stats ?

item.title: Where can i change max lvls of stats?
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

search for

Return 99

it should look like this:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

        for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
        }
        return 99;

}[/code]

Now to change max level, change the two 99â€™s to whatever you want. Example:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

        for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
        }
        return 200;

}[/code]

My max level is 200 and my combat level is 55 but tbh most people like to keep their sats at 99 like me
